pages.title: Easy Emerald Tools
pages.text: Provides a standard set of armor, tools, and weapons that are between Iron and Diamond. Also includes AOE Hammers & Excavators.$(li)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/easy-emerald-tools)Curseforge page$(/l) lots of information.$(li)$(l:https://discord.gg/j7bYbkW)Discord$(/l)$()
